title: SPEED IT UP!
desc:
Post 624
- This may only be played on <:lime:1108048230542999633> cards.
- All cards are now ⚡ cards.
- If you play two ⚡ cards in a turn, your turn ends immediately, unless you play this card.
- If you play this card, your turn ends if you play three ⚡ cards in a row.
- Zap cards can now be played normally.
